modName: Imperial Helmet adjusted for Steel Plate
descriptionHtml:
This is a texture mod for the Imperial Helmet.

I\'ve made some minor adjustments to make the helmet look better in combination with Steel Plate Armor:
Adjusted Colors.
Added the mesh texture to the eyes which were flat black before.
New more detailed hair texture.

Installation:
Extract the \"textures\" folder from within the archive into your \"Data\" folder.
author: Pahricida

files.name: Imperial Helmet adjusted for Steel Plate
